### Story

As a [type of user], I want to [perform some task], So that [achieve some goal
or benefit].

---

### Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Given some context When an action is performed Then an outcome is expected
- [ ] Given some context When an action is performed Then an outcome is expected
- [ ] Given some context When an action is performed Then an outcome is expected
